item.title: Modular Sbom Automation: Now With Aws S3 Support
item.description:
In our previous posts, we streamlined SBOM workflows by moving them from GitHub releases or local folders directly into platforms like Dependency-Track and then, we took it one step further with folder continuous monitoring‚Äîcontinuous fetching and uploading via sbommv‚Äôs daemon mode, which runs in the background and keeps an eye on target folders for any incoming or modified SBOMs.
